name: GameAssist
description:
GameAssist is a modular Roll20 API automation suite designed for D&D 5E (2014 Character Sheet).

Commands:
	!ga-enable <ModuleName>
	!ga-disable <ModuleName>
	!ga-config list|set|get|modules

Core modules include CritFumble, NPCManager, ConcentrationTracker, NPCHPRoller (TokenMod required for most features).

Features:
	- Modular loader: enable/disable modules in real time
	- Priority task queue and watchdog reset
	- In-chat config and live toggling
	- Compatibility audit for common scripts

Installation:
	1. Requires Roll20 Pro subscription (API access).
	2. (Strongly recommended) Install TokenMod API.
	3. Add GameAssist.js via One-Click or copy into API scripts panel.

For full documentation, see the GitHub repo: https://github.com/Mord-Eagle/GameAssist

Please report bugs or request features via GitHub Issues.
conflicts: Other scripts that modify NPC HP or use bar1_value
